Articles.Content:
3458: During the second Kraken incident of all time, a Kerbal on EVA is mysteriously torn apart.

3459: The development of stronger telescopes allows astronomers to see that at large orbital speeds and distances, their universe is becoming strangely unstable.
Ã¢â‚¬â€¹no destroying the universe!!!!1!1!!!1

I wasn't planning to destroy the universe, I was just going to introduce them to the Kraken.

heehee
3500: The second great outbreak of K-Syndrome occurs, and everyone is infected except the Kerbals on remote islands and on the continent of Pacifica (the large islands in the southern hemisphere)

3500.1: Wolverine Kerman has his mind sent back in time in order to somehow prevent the K-syndrome outbreak retroactively. Unfortunately he ends up inspiring a cheesy movie franchise based on himself and a group of super-Kerbals known as the "K-Men". For some reason though, the K-syndrome actually does go away.

3502: A probe is launched onto an eccentric Kerbolar orbit to investigate the spacetime fluctuations, but explodes mysteriously before having a chance to send back any usable data. Concern starts to grow among a large number of Kerbals about the safety of interplanetary travel.
3503: A walrus about the size of gilly is noticed orbiting around Vall.

3504: The head of the Kerbin Astronomical Society is assassinated in a car chase. Through Sector 120-BR of Jeb's Junkyard. Which partially explodes.

3504.5: The new head of the KAS declares all who believe in the walrus to be heretics.

3505: The Kraken declares war on the Walrus. There can only be one! Ignorant of these grand space politics, however, Kerbalkind merely observes a beautiful light show of mysterious explosions in the vicinity of Jool and its moons. Plans are hatched to launch an expedition to investigate the aftermath and possible causes of the event - perhaps a broken up comet? Alien life forms? An elaborate hoax?

3507: Facing budget limitations of an odd sort, the Kerbal Space Program has to begin the expedition with a single massive mothership. To ensure maximal benefits from data collection, the ship is designed to send landers to each of Jool's five moons, and is thus called the Jool-5 Challenger. A trend starts among Kerbal children wherein they play games related to the so-called Jool-5 Challenge, and in some instances share videos about it challenging their friends to participate.
3550: The Kerbals finally decide to make a chat page about themselves, and I post this post.
3552: Construction of the Jool-5 Challenger is completed. Now they must wait for the launch window in 3356...

3553 Kerbals and humans starting trading.

3356 jool challanger launched!

3357 bac9 kerman develops HX systems.

3359 private and public companies start launching mining ships to all the available planets. And warping is being fixed to stabilise for warping with kerbals on board.

3360 jump points bbetween earth and kerbin has been created. First jump ship driven by paramicium kerman successfully made to earth. More talks are held to discuss warping and the negative effects.

3400 jool located . strange gas found. Caslon

(Caslon reference from Distant worlds)

Kerbals also discovers the interwebz. Forums threads like forum.humanspaceprogram.com is created. (NOT REAL!)

3500 kethane equipment dispatched to mun

3600 minmus base setup.

Edited September 14, 2014 by Joshwoo69
sorry for extra stuff I wad on a spree!! ~fixes
Seriously. This threadneeds some activity. Come on people!
Year:3601 The Jool 5 ship arrives a Jool, the walrus appears to be invincible, and it's name is Mr.Walrus123
3650: The Walrus would have been deleted, as it was holographic. But where was the projector?

3651 the projector was retrieved. Gene kerman says it looks cool . researchers start analysing the projector.

3690 hyperwarp research starts

3750 hyperwarp research 50%

3800 hyperwarp research finished!

First exploration ship was also built.

Since when do Kerbal names ever have numbers in them?

Anyway.

3801: A massive government cover-up is leaked to the public: turns out the "humans" with which the Kerbal nations had been trading didn't actually exist and all media depictions of them were computer-generated. In a desperate attempt to appease the public, the Department of Kerbland Sekurity creates computer-generated pop idol Hatsune Kerman.

3802: The exploration ship "First" is readied for departure from its parking orbit around Kerbin. Its mission: to search for habitable exoplanets in the star systems nearest to Kerbol. Unfortunately, it is attacked by a terrorist group known as the Kerbal Sedition, delaying its departure preparations for another several years.

3806: first is fitted with weapons as an afterthought.

3806.5:first runs first weapons test on recently discovered kerbal sedition base.

3806.6:first runs refilling for a year

3806.9999999: Danny Kerman escapes and somehow gets to modify the craft with phantom force boosters. he also becomes captain.

Edited September 16, 2014 by megatiger78

3807: The governments realize that phantom force boosters are highly unstable and could destroy the planet. They initiate the First's self-destruct protocol, and with 2 days until detonation, it-

next poster decides

3808: Top scientists discover that the phantom force boosters have an off switch, and they flip it. This stops the self-destruct sequence.

3808.5: Scientists turn the boosters into a warp drive.

Edited September 17, 2014 by Engineer Of Stuff

3808.5001: Unfortunately a typographic error occurs in the engineering department, and the boosters are turned into a wrap drive. It functions rather like a normal rocket, except that instead of exhaust it spews snack bar wrappers out the back end. The specific impulse is abominable, and First's departure is delayed yet again.

3810: First finally actually breaks orbit, sporting shiny new fully operational weapons systems and a reworked warp drive that actually warps. Within a few months it reaches Kerbol's nearest neighbor and begins scanning for signs of habitable planets.
3810.5:78 gigantic tigers are found by first. walrus 123 is also sighted again.
3811: The ship finds Earth and makes contact with Humans!

what again?

3811.5: kerbal government reminds the crew of first that humans do not exist.

3812. the projector for the supposed "sol system" is found. danny kerman blamed. crew exchanges captain for manley kerman

Year 3820: It turns out that the Mr.walrus was a projection of a real giant walrus that lies just outside of Kerbol's SOI

Year 3822: A group of scientists discover the KIGGS Boson, AKA the "snack" particle
I think we need a Kerbal History 3 with some more rules... this started off great but now the thread is going crazy.
